# ARSessionProviding

**Protocol**

An object that provides a session.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol ARSessionProviding : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

As an example usage, [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARCoachingOverlayView] exposes [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARCoachingOverlayView/sessionProvider] to access your app’s current session.

## Providing a Session

- **session**: A contract to declare an AR session.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol

## Conforming Types

- ARSCNView
- ARSKView
